20101221160603.000|20101221160603.000|CC1|            realize that depresn
20101221160603.000|20101221160606.000|CC1|  has left you nowhere to go.esn
20101221160606.000|20101221160606.000|CC1| When you've lost interest in   
20101221160606.000|20101221160608.000|CC1|          everything.           
20101221160608.000|20101221160608.000|CC1| When you've had one too many   
20101221160608.000|20101221160611.000|CC1|days feeling sad or anxious...  
20101221160611.000|20101221160614.000|CC1|   aches and pains, fatigue.    
20101221160614.000|20101221160614.000|CC1|When it becomes hard to ignore  
20101221160614.000|20101221160616.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20101221160616.000|20101221160618.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20101221160618.000|20101221160619.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20101221160619.000|20101221160619.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20101221160619.000|20101221160623.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20101221160623.000|20101221160623.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20101221160623.000|20101221160625.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20101221160625.000|20101221160625.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20101221160625.000|20101221160628.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20101221160628.000|20101221160628.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20101221160628.000|20101221160628.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20101221160628.000|20101221160632.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20101221160632.000|20101221160632.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20101221160632.000|20101221160634.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20101221160634.000|20101221160634.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20101221160634.000|20101221160636.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20101221160636.000|20101221160636.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20101221160636.000|20101221160639.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20101221160639.000|20101221160639.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20101221160639.000|20101221160641.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20101221160641.000|20101221160641.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20101221160641.000|20101221160643.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20101221160643.000|20101221160643.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20101221160643.000|20101221160646.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20101221160646.000|20101221160646.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20101221160646.000|20101221160649.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20101221160649.000|20101221160649.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20101221160649.000|20101221160651.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20101221160651.000|20101221160651.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20101221160651.000|20101221160653.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20101221160653.000|20101221160655.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20101221160655.000|20101221160655.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20101221160655.000|20101221160657.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20101221160657.000|20101221160657.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20101221160657.000|20101221160659.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20101221160659.000|20101221160659.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20101221160659.000|20101221160702.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20101221160702.000|20101221160702.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20101221160702.000|20101221160704.000|CC1|         upon standing.         
20101221160704.000|20101221160704.000|CC1|Side effects include nausea, dry
20101221160704.000|20101221160707.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.
